headline: AWK Makes it to CNBC’s All-Weather Stock List
summary: American Water Works Company, Inc. (NYSE:AWK) is one of the best stocks for a retirement stock portfolio. The stock was recently added to CNBC’s ‘All-Weather Stock List’ because of its defensive qualities. Before this, it was also featured in a list by Trivariate Research highlighting the top-performing S&P stocks during the tariff-related market correction from […]
